title: MPfree: The Kills – DNA
body:
![](http://thesilvertongueonline.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/the-kills.jpg "Kills")British based rock duo The Kills return with a new album, Blood Pressures later this year, and have already premiered one track from it, the synth heavy Satellite. Now they are following in the footsteps of many other artists, by giving away a free song from the upcoming record. Just head over to their official site and swap your email address for a link to download DNA. Blood Pressure is released one the 4th of April, through Domino Records and will feature both Satellite and DNA.

[Download DNA](http://www.thekills.tv/dna.php)
